detailed_translations.english: something that you give someone, for example to thank them or because you like them, especially on a special occasion

name: impact
trans: To impact is to have a strong effect on something or someone.

sentences.english: Such schemes mean little unless they impact people.
sentences.chinese: 除非能对人们造成影响，否则这样的计划意义不大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 影响， 作用， 冲击
detailed_translations.english: to have an important or noticeable effect on someone or something
the effect or influence that an event, situation etc has on someone or something

name: machine
trans: To machine is to make or operate a machine.

sentences.english: Could you get me a coffee from the drinks machine ?
sentences.chinese: 给我从自动饮料机里买一罐咖啡好吗？

sentences.english: The fax machine is broken.
sentences.chinese: 传真机坏了。

sentences.english: Did you put my dirty shirts in the machine (= washing machine ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你把我的脏衬衫放进洗衣机里了吗？

sentences.english: I left a message for you on your machine (= telephone answering machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 我在你的电话答录机里留了言。

sentences.english: The machine wouldn’t let me have any money (= cash machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 自动取款机不让我取钱。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment with moving parts that uses power such as electricity to do a particular job

name: shape
trans: To shape is to form or give a particular form to something.

sentences.english: What shape is the table?
sentences.chinese: 那张桌子是什么形状的？

sentences.english: You can recognize a tree by the shape of its leaves.
sentences.chinese: 可以根据树叶的形状辨认出是什么树。

sentences.english: His battered old hat had completely lost its shape.
sentences.chinese: 他那顶破旧的帽子已经完全变形了。

sentences.english: The plants grow in every shape and size .
sentences.chinese: 这些植物有各种形状，各种大小。

sentences.english: The children cut out shapes (= squares, triangles etc ) from the piece of cardboard.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们把卡纸片剪成各种形状。

detailed_translations.english: the form that something has, for example round, square,  triangular  etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合
detailed_translations.english: to influence something such as a belief, opinion etc and make it develop in a particular way

name: tool
trans: To tool is to use a tool to accomplish a task.

sentences.english: I don’t have the right tools to start fiddling around with the engine.
sentences.chinese: 我没有合适的工具来摆弄发动机。

sentences.english: a shop selling garden tools
sentences.chinese: 出售园艺工具的商店

detailed_translations.chinese: 工具，用具；器械，机床；手段
detailed_translations.english: something that you hold in your hand and use to do a particular job

detailed_translations.chinese: 使用工具；用机床装备工厂

name: wind
trans: To wind is to twist or turn something in a spiral or circular pattern.

sentences.english: The wind blew from the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 风从东北方向吹来。

detailed_translations.english: moving air, especially when it moves strongly or quickly in a current

name: address
trans: To address is to speak or write to someone about a particular topic or issue.

detailed_translations.english: if you address a problem, you start trying to solve it

name: average
trans: To average is to calculate the mean or typical value of a set of numbers or data.

sentences.english: The average American has not even thought about next year’s election.
sentences.chinese: 普通的美国人甚至还没有想过明年的选举。

sentences.english: In an average week I drive about 250 miles.
sentences.chinese: 平常我每周开车约250英里。

detailed_translations.english: having qualities that are typical of most people or things

name: career
trans: To career is to move quickly and uncontrollably in a particular direction, often in a dangerous or reckless manner.

sentences.english: a teaching career
sentences.chinese: 教学事业

sentences.english: He realized that his acting career was over.
sentences.chinese: 他意识到自己的演艺事业已走到了尽头。

sentences.english: a physiotherapist who wanted to make a dramatic career change by becoming an author
sentences.chinese: 想彻底改行当作家的理疗师

sentences.english: Nurses want an improved career structure (= better opportunities to move upwards in their jobs ) .
sentences.chinese: 护士希望有更好的职业架构。

detailed_translations.english: the series of jobs that a person has in a particular area of work, usually involving more responsibility as time passes

name: culture
trans: To culture is to grow or develop a particular type of organism or cells in a laboratory or other controlled environment.

sentences.english: We speak Danish at home so that the boys don’t lose touch with their language and culture.
sentences.chinese: 我们在家说丹麦语，这样男孩子们就不会脱离他们的语言和文化。

sentences.english: In our culture, it is rude to ask someone how much they earn.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的文化里，问别人收入多少是不礼貌的。

sentences.english: I love working abroad and meeting people from diffe-rent cultures.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在国外工作，认识来自不同文化的人。

detailed_translations.english: the beliefs, way of life, art, and customs that are shared and accepted by people in a particular society

name: pot
trans: To pot is to plant or place a plant in a pot or container.

sentences.english: pots and pans
sentences.chinese: 锅碗瓢盆

sentences.english: a pot of jam
sentences.chinese: 一罐果酱

detailed_translations.english: a deep round container used for cooking things in

name: sign
trans: To sign is to write or mark a signature on a document or surface.

sentences.english: the dollar sign
sentences.chinese: 美元符号

sentences.english: a minus sign
sentences.chinese: 减号

sentences.english: a sign on the door
sentences.chinese: 门上的标牌

sentences.english: Sign here, please.
sentences.chinese: 请在这里签字。

detailed_translations.english: a mark or shape that has a particular meaning
to write your signature on something to show that you wrote it, agree with it, or were present

name: table
trans: To table is to put forward for discussion or consideration, often in a formal setting such as a meeting or parliamentary session.

sentences.english: The food was served on long tables.
sentences.chinese: 食物放在长餐桌上供应。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture with a flat top supported by legs
to leave a bill etc to be discussed or dealt with in the future

name: task
trans: To task is to assign or give someone a particular job or responsibility to complete.

sentences.english: Sara had the task of preparing the agenda for meetings.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉的任务是准备会议议程。

sentences.english: I was given the task of building a fire.
sentences.chinese: 我分配到生火的任务。

sentences.english: the skills required to carry out these tasks
sentences.chinese: 执行这些任务所需要的技能

sentences.english: He soon realized the scale of the task he had undertaken .
sentences.chinese: 他很快就意识到他所承担任务的艰巨性了。

sentences.english: Our first task is to gather information.
sentences.chinese: 我们的首要任务是收集信息。

sentences.english: Monkeys can be taught to do simple tasks .
sentences.chinese: 猴子能被教会做一些简单的事。

sentences.english: They have the unenviable task of supervising the most dangerous prison in the country.
sentences.chinese: 他们有个令人头疼的工作，就是管理国家最危险的监狱。

sentences.english: Volunteers had the thankless task of distributing campaign leaflets.
sentences.chinese: 志愿者的任务是分发活动传单，吃力不讨好。

sentences.english: Trying to bring up a small daughter on your own is no easy task .
sentences.chinese: 独自抚养年幼的女儿不是件轻而易举的事。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of work that must be done, especially one that is difficult or unpleasant or that must be done regularly

name: condition
trans: To condition is to train or prepare someone or something to perform a particular action or task.

sentences.english: Profits increased by £1.5m, despite the difficult economic conditions.
sentences.chinese: 尽管经济形势不佳，利润还是增长了150万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: the state that something is in, especially how good or bad its physical state is

name: contact
trans: To contact is to communicate or get in touch with someone through a phone call, email, or other means of communication.

sentences.english: The town is cut off from contact with the outside world.
sentences.chinese: 小镇与外界的联系被切断了。

sentences.english: Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any queries.
sentences.chinese: 你如果有任何疑问，尽管和我联系。

detailed_translations.english: communication with a person, organization, country etc
to write to or telephone someone

name: credit
trans: To credit is to acknowledge or give recognition to someone or something for their contributions or accomplishments.

sentences.english: We found his statement hard to credit.
sentences.chinese: 我们觉得他的说法令人难以信服。

sentences.english: The witness’s story gained credit with the jury.
sentences.chinese: 证人的陈述被陪审团采信了。

detailed_translations.english: to believe that something is true
the belief that something is true or correct

name: egg
trans: To egg is to encourage or provoke someone to do something, often in a negative or aggressive manner.

sentences.english: Blackbirds lay their eggs in March.
sentences.chinese: 乌鸫在3月产蛋。

sentences.english: an ostrich egg
sentences.chinese: 鸵鸟蛋

sentences.english: The eggs hatch (= break open to allow the baby out ) in 26 days.
sentences.chinese: 这些蛋要26天才能孵化。

sentences.english: Joe always has bacon and egg for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 乔早餐总是吃熏肉加蛋。

detailed_translations.english: a round object with a hard surface, that contains a baby bird, snake, insect etc and which is produced by a female bird, snake, insect etc

name: hope
trans: To hope is to feel optimistic or confident that something desired or wished for will happen.

sentences.english: I do hope everything goes well.
sentences.chinese: 我真心希望一切顺利。

sentences.english: It was hoped that the job would be filled by a local person.
sentences.chinese: 希望该职位由当地人来担任。

sentences.english: Let’s just hope someone finds her bag.
sentences.chinese: 希望有人找到她的提包。

sentences.english: I hope to God I haven’t left the car window open.
sentences.chinese: 但愿我没有忘记关车窗。

sentences.english: When I first arrived in New York, I was full of hope for the future.
sentences.chinese: 我初到纽约时，对未来充满希望。

detailed_translations.english: to want something to happen or be true and to believe that it is possible or likely
a feeling of wanting something to happen or be true and believing that it is possible or likely

name: ice
trans: To ice is to cover or coat something with ice or frost.

name: network
trans: To network is to establish or develop a network of contacts or relationships for professional or social purposes.

sentences.english: Hungary’s telephone network
sentences.chinese: 匈牙利的电话网

sentences.english: a high-speed European rail network
sentences.chinese: 欧洲的高速铁路网

sentences.english: the network of blood vessels in the body
sentences.chinese: 人体内的血管网

detailed_translations.english: a system of lines, tubes, wires, roads etc that cross each other and are connected to each other

name: separate
trans: To separate is to divide or disconnect something into parts or pieces.

sentences.english: The gym and the sauna are in separate buildings.
sentences.chinese: 健身房和桑拿浴室在不同的大楼里。

detailed_translations.english: not joined to or touching something else

name: attempt
trans: To attempt is to try or make an effort to do something, often with the expectation of success.

sentences.english: Weather conditions prevented them from attempting the jump.
sentences.chinese: 天气状况使他们无法尝试跳伞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尝试， 试图， 努力
detailed_translations.english: to try to do something, especially something difficult

name: date
trans: To date is to go on a romantic or social outing with someone, often with the intention of exploring a potential romantic relationship.

sentences.english: The date on the letter was 30th August 1962.
sentences.chinese: 信上的日期是1962年8月30日。

sentences.english: What’s today’s date?
sentences.chinese: 今天几号？

sentences.english: Make sure you sign and date it at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 一定要在底下签上姓名和日期。

detailed_translations.english: a particular day of the month or year, especially shown by a number
to write or print the date on something

name: effect
trans: To effect is to bring about or cause a change or result in something.

sentences.english: the long-term effects of the drug
sentences.chinese: 这种毒品的长期影响

sentences.english: I could feel the effects of the thin mountain air.
sentences.chinese: 我能感觉到山上稀薄空气产生的影响。

sentences.english: This ingredient also has the effect of making your skin look younger.
sentences.chinese: 这种成分还有使皮肤看上去更年轻的效果。

sentences.english: A system failure has a knock-on effect throughout the whole hotel.
sentences.chinese: 系统故障会给整个酒店带来连锁反应。

sentences.english: the cumulative effect of human activities on the global environment
sentences.chinese: 人类活动对全球环境日积月累的影响

sentences.english: A much lower dose of the painkiller can still produce the desired effect.
sentences.chinese: 大量减少该止痛药的服用剂量依然能产生预期的效果。

sentences.english: In mental illness, there is a complex relationship between cause and effect.
sentences.chinese: 精神疾病有复杂的因果关系。

detailed_translations.english: a change that is caused by an event, action etc

name: link
trans: To link is to connect or join together two or more things or ideas.

sentences.english: He walked with her, linking arms (= putting his arm around her arm ).
sentences.chinese: 他与她挽臂同行。

detailed_translations.english: to join two things by putting one through the other
each ring of a chain

name: perfect
trans: To perfect is to make something as good or flawless as possible.

sentences.english: His English was perfect.
sentences.chinese: 他的英语很地道。

sentences.english: The car was in perfect condition.
sentences.chinese: 这辆车的车况极佳。

sentences.english: You’re very lucky to have perfect teeth.
sentences.chinese: 你能拥有一口完美的牙齿太幸运了。

sentences.english: a perfect performance
sentences.chinese: 完美的演出

sentences.english: In a perfect world, we wouldn’t need an army.
sentences.chinese: 在理想世界中，我们不需要军队。

detailed_translations.english: not having any mistakes, faults, or damage

name: post
trans: To post is to publish or share something online or on a public platform.

sentences.english: a fence post
sentences.chinese: 篱笆桩

sentences.english: The exam results were posted on the bulletin board yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 考试成绩昨天在布告板上贴出来了。

detailed_translations.english: a strong upright piece of wood, metal etc that is fixed into the ground, especially to support something
to put up a public notice about something on a wall or notice board

name: star
trans: To star is to feature or be the main performer in a movie, TV show, or other performance.

sentences.english: I lay on my back and looked up at the stars.
sentences.chinese: 我仰卧着看天上的星星。

sentences.english: The sky was filled with stars.
sentences.chinese: 满天繁星。

sentences.english: The stars were shining .
sentences.chinese: 群星闪烁。

sentences.english: The stars were all out (= they were shining ) .
sentences.chinese: 星耀天空。

sentences.english: The stars were twinkling overhead (= shining and quickly changing from bright to faint ) .
sentences.chinese: 头顶上星星闪烁。

detailed_translations.english: a large ball of burning gas in space that can be seen at night as a point of light in the sky

detailed_translations.chinese: 以星状物装饰,变成演员

name: voice
trans: To voice is to express or articulate one's thoughts or opinions in a clear and audible manner.

sentences.english: He recognized her voice instantly.
sentences.chinese: 他立刻听出了她的声音。

sentences.english: I could hear angry voices.
sentences.chinese: 我听到了愤怒的声音。

detailed_translations.english: the sounds that you make when you speak, or the ability to make these sounds
to tell people your opinions or feelings about a particular subject

name: challenge
trans: To challenge is to question or dispute something, often in a competitive or confrontational manner.

sentences.english: They threw down the challenge that he couldn’t wash 40 cars in one hour (= invited him to try to do it ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们激将他，说他不可能在1小时内擦洗40辆汽车。

detailed_translations.chinese: 挑战，邀请比赛；艰巨的任务；怀疑，质问
detailed_translations.english: something that tests strength, skill, or ability, especially in a way that is interesting

detailed_translations.chinese: 反对， 公然反抗； 向…挑战； 对…质疑
detailed_translations.english: to refuse to accept that something is right, fair, or legal

name: friend
trans: To friend is to add someone as a friend on a social media platform or establish a friendship with someone.

sentences.english: Jerry, this is my friend Sue.
sentences.chinese: 杰里，这是我的朋友休。

sentences.english: She’s always out with her friends.
sentences.chinese: 她常同朋友们一起出去。

sentences.english: One of her closest friends died at the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 她的一位密友周末过世了。

sentences.english: I met Jim through a friend.
sentences.chinese: 经一位朋友介绍，我认识了吉姆。

detailed_translations.english: someone who you know and like very much and enjoy spending time with

name: warm
trans: To warm is to increase the temperature or heat of something or someone.

sentences.english: The house was lovely and warm.
sentences.chinese: 那房子漂亮温暖。

sentences.english: I hope we get some warm weather soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望天气很快就会回暖。

sentences.english: I’ve put your dinner in the oven to keep it warm.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的饭菜放进了烤箱里保温。

sentences.english: warm water
sentences.chinese: 温水

detailed_translations.english: slightly hot, especially in a pleasant way
to make someone or something warm or warmer, or to become warm or warmer

name: brush
trans: To brush is to clean or groom something using a brush or similar tool.

sentences.english: a scrubbing brush
sentences.chinese: 硬毛刷，板刷

detailed_translations.english: an object that you use for cleaning, painting, making your hair tidy etc, made with a lot of hairs,  bristle s  , or thin pieces of plastic, fastened to a handle

name: couple
trans: To couple is to connect or join two things or people together.

sentences.english: a newly married couple
sentences.chinese: 一对新婚夫妇

sentences.english: the couple next door
sentences.chinese: 隔壁的那对夫妇

detailed_translations.english: two people who are married or having a sexual or romantic relationship

name: debate
trans: To debate is to discuss or argue about a particular topic or issue, often with the intention of persuading others to one's point of view.

sentences.english: the gun-control debate in the US
sentences.chinese: 美国有关控制枪支的争论

sentences.english: The new drug has become the subject of heated debate within the medical profession.
sentences.chinese: 这种新药成了医学界激烈争论的话题。

sentences.english: There was much lively debate about whether women should spend more time in the home.
sentences.chinese: 就妇女是否应该花更多时间待在家里这个话题有许多热烈的争论。

sentences.english: A fierce debate raged over which artist’s work should be chosen for the prize.
sentences.chinese: 就哪位艺术家的作品应该得奖一事展开了激烈的争论。

sentences.english: The issue will be debated on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题将在星期二讨论。

detailed_translations.english: discussion of a particular subject that often continues for a long time and in which people express different opinions
to discuss a subject formally when you are trying to make a decision or find a solution

name: exit
trans: To exit is to leave or depart from a place, often with the intention of going somewhere else.

sentences.english: We made for the nearest exit.
sentences.chinese: 我们走向最近的出口。

sentences.english: an exit door
sentences.chinese: 出口门

sentences.english: Two men were blocking her exit.
sentences.chinese: 两个男人挡住了她出去的路。

detailed_translations.english: a door or space through which you can leave a public room, building etc
to leave a place

name: experienced
trans: To experience is to go through or live through a particular event, situation, or circumstance.

sentences.english: an experienced pilot
sentences.chinese: 经验丰富的飞行员

sentences.english: an experienced public speaker
sentences.chinese: 老练的公开演讲者

sentences.english: She is experienced and self-assured.
sentences.chinese: 她经验丰富且充满自信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 老练的，熟练的；富有经验的
detailed_translations.english: possessing skills or knowledge because you have done something often or for a long time

name: function
trans: To function is to work or operate in a particular way, often with a specific purpose or objective.

sentences.english: Her legs have now ceased to function .
sentences.chinese: 她的双腿现在已经丧失正常功能了。

sentences.english: You know I can’t function (= cannot perform normal activities ) without a coffee in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 你知道的，我早上不喝杯咖啡就无法工作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作， 运行； 起作用
detailed_translations.english: to work in the correct or intended way

detailed_translations.chinese: 功能，职务；【数】函数；重大聚会
detailed_translations.english: the purpose that something has, or the job that someone or something does

name: lack
trans: To lack is to not have or possess something that is needed or desired.

sentences.english: Alex’s real problem is that he lacks confidence.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯的真正问题是缺乏信心。

detailed_translations.english: to not have something that you need, or not have enough of it

name: plant
trans: To plant is to sow or place a seed or plant in the ground with the intention of growing it.

sentences.english: Don’t forget to water the plants.
sentences.chinese: 别忘记给植物浇水。

sentences.english: a huge chemical plant
sentences.chinese: 一座大型化工厂

sentences.english: Residents have helped us plant trees.
sentences.chinese: 居民们帮助我们种了树。

detailed_translations.english: a living thing that has leaves and roots and grows in earth, especially one that is smaller than a tree
to put plants or seeds in the ground to grow

name: spot
trans: To spot is to see or notice something, often in a quick or casual manner.

sentences.english: a nice quiet spot on the beach
sentences.chinese: 海滩上一个安静的好地方

sentences.english: I chose a spot well away from the road.
sentences.chinese: 我选了一个远离马路的地点。

detailed_translations.english: a particular place or area, especially a pleasant place where you spend time

detailed_translations.chinese: 认出， 发现； 玷污
detailed_translations.english: to notice someone or something, especially when they are difficult to see or recognize

name: summer
trans: To summer is to spend time during the summer season in a particular place or activity.

sentences.english: We tour by car every summer.
sentences.chinese: 每年夏天我们都驾车出外旅行。

sentences.english: Food must be refrigerated in summer.
sentences.chinese: 食物在夏天必须加以冷藏。

sentences.english: After a summer here the poorest sheep and cattle grow strong and fat.
sentences.chinese: 经过一个夏天， 连最差的牛羊在这里也长得又肥又壮了。

name: taste
trans: To taste is to experience or perceive the flavor or quality of something through the mouth or sense of taste.

sentences.english: Some birds have a highly developed sense of taste.
sentences.chinese: 有些鸟的味觉很发达。

sentences.english: She has such good taste.
sentences.chinese: 她的品位很高雅。

detailed_translations.english: the sense by which you know one food from another

name: theme
trans: To theme is to design or organize something around a particular topic, idea, or concept.

sentences.english: The book’s theme is the conflict between love and duty.
sentences.chinese: 本书的主题是爱与责任之间的冲突。

sentences.english: Freia’s theme in Wagner’s opera
sentences.chinese: 瓦格纳歌剧中的弗莱雅主旋律

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目；主题；主旋律；（句子的）主位；词干
detailed_translations.english: the main subject or idea in a piece of writing, speech, film etc

name: track
trans: To track is to follow or monitor the progress or movement of something or someone over time.

sentences.english: Police have been tracking the four criminals all over Central America.
sentences.chinese: 警方一直在中美洲到处追捕这四名罪犯。

detailed_translations.english: to search for a person or animal by following the marks they leave behind them on the ground, their smell etc
a line of marks left on the ground by a moving person, animal, or vehicle

name: wing
trans: To wing is to fly or glide through the air using wings or a similar mechanism.

sentences.english: a butterfly with beautiful markings on its wings
sentences.chinese: 翅膀上有美丽花纹的蝴蝶

sentences.english: The pheasant flapped its wings vigorously.
sentences.chinese: 野鸡猛烈地拍打翅膀。

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts of a bird’s or insect’s body that it uses for flying
to fly somewhere

name: brain
trans: To brain is to hit or strike someone on the head, often with the intention of causing harm.

sentences.english: Messages from the brain are carried by the central nervous system.
sentences.chinese: 大脑发出的信息是通过中枢神经系统传递的。

sentences.english: the chemistry of the brain
sentences.chinese: 大脑的化学性质

sentences.english: the human brain
sentences.chinese: 人脑

sentences.english: She died of a brain tumour.
sentences.chinese: 她死于脑瘤。

sentences.english: The job requires brains.
sentences.chinese: 做这工作需要头脑。

detailed_translations.english: the organ inside your head that controls how you think, feel, and move

name: button
trans: To button is to fasten or secure something using a button or similar device.

sentences.english: small pearl buttons
sentences.chinese: 小的珍珠纽扣

sentences.english: A button was missing from his shirt.
sentences.chinese: 他的衬衫上掉了一颗纽扣。

sentences.english: She undid (=  unfastened  ) the buttons of her blouse.
sentences.chinese: 她解开衬衫的纽扣。

detailed_translations.english: a small round flat object on your shirt, coat etc that you pass through a hole to fasten it
to fasten clothes with buttons, or to be fastened with buttons

name: click
trans: To click is to press or activate a button or control using a mouse or other input device.

sentences.english: The door clicked shut behind me.
sentences.chinese: 门在我身后咔嗒一声关上了。

sentences.english: Mother clicked her tongue (= made a short sound to show disapproval ) and sighed.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈咂咂嘴，叹了口气。

sentences.english: Edmund clicked his fingers (= made a short sound to get someone’s attention ) for John to follow him.
sentences.chinese: 埃德蒙弹了个响指示意约翰跟着他。

sentences.english: Vogel clicked his heels (= hit the heels of his shoes together ) and bowed.
sentences.chinese: 沃格尔咔嗒一声并拢脚跟，鞠了个躬。

sentences.english: Twist the lever and the gears click into place .
sentences.chinese: 转动变速杆，排挡就咔嗒一声到位了。

sentences.english: You can check your e-mail with a click of your mouse.
sentences.chinese: 通过鼠标的一点你就能查电子邮件。

detailed_translations.english: to make a short hard sound, or make something produce this sound
Click is also a noun

name: correct
trans: To correct is to fix or rectify an error or mistake, often in a written or spoken context.

sentences.english: If my calculations are correct, we’re about ten miles from Exeter.
sentences.chinese: 如果我计算得没错的话，我们离埃克塞特大约十英里。

sentences.english: Score one point for each correct answer .
sentences.chinese: 答对一题得一分。

sentences.english: You are absolutely correct, the Missouri is the longest river in the US.
sentences.chinese: 你说的完全正确，密苏里河是美国最长的河流。

sentences.english: Some eyesight problems are relatively easy to correct.
sentences.chinese: 有些视力问题比较容易矫正。

detailed_translations.english: having no mistakes
to make something right or to make it work the way it should

name: desire
trans: To desire is to want or wish for something strongly.

sentences.english: The hotel has everything you could possibly desire .
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店里你想要的东西应有尽有。

sentences.english: Add lemon juice if desired .
sentences.chinese: 需要的话加点柠檬汁。

detailed_translations.english: to want something very much
a strong hope or wish

name: fixed
trans: To fix is to make something stable or secure in one place.

sentences.english: The classes begin and end at fixed times.
sentences.chinese: 上下课的时间都是固定不变的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 确定的；固执的；<美口>处境的；准备好的
detailed_translations.english: firmly fastened to a particular position

name: foot
trans: To foot is to walk or travel by foot.

sentences.english: My foot hurts.
sentences.chinese: 我脚痛。

sentences.english: I had blisters on the soles of my feet .
sentences.chinese: 我的脚底起泡了。

sentences.english: I dropped a glass earlier, so don’t walk around in bare feet .
sentences.chinese: 我刚才打破了一个玻璃杯，所以不要光着脚到处走。

sentences.english: The vet examined the horse’s hind feet .
sentences.chinese: 兽医检查了马的后蹄。

sentences.english: He walked to the foot of the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 他走到楼梯下面。

sentences.english: He’s six feet tall , with blonde hair.
sentences.chinese: 他身高六英尺，一头金发。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body that you stand on and walk on

name: gas
trans: To gas is to fill or power with gas.

sentences.english: hydrogen gas
sentences.chinese: 氢气

sentences.english: Can you light the gas for me?
sentences.chinese: 你帮我点燃煤气好吗？

sentences.english: I probably spend over 200 a month on gas.
sentences.chinese: 我一个月大概要花200多美元汽油钱。

detailed_translations.english: a substance such as air, which is not solid or liquid, and usually cannot be seen

name: influence
trans: To influence is to have an effect on someone or something.

sentences.english: He used his influence to get his son into medical school.
sentences.chinese: 他利用权势把儿子弄进了医学院。

sentences.english: He denies exerting any political influence over them.
sentences.chinese: 他否认曾向他们施加过政治影响。

detailed_translations.english: the power to make other people agree with your opinions or do what you want

name: notice
trans: To notice is to become aware of something.

sentences.english: He noticed a woman in a black dress sitting across from him.
sentences.chinese: 他看到有位黑衣女子坐在他的对面。

sentences.english: I didn’t notice any smoke.
sentences.chinese: 我没注意到有烟。

sentences.english: Have you noticed any change in him?
sentences.chinese: 你注意到他有什么变化了吗？

sentences.english: I waved but they took no notice.
sentences.chinese: 我挥了挥手，可是他们没有注意到。

sentences.english: Firefighters were prepared to rush out at a moment’s notice.
sentences.chinese: 消防队员准备着随时出动。

detailed_translations.english: if you notice something or someone, you realize that they exist, especially because you can see, hear, or feel them
when you notice or pay attention to someone or something

name: rain
trans: To rain is to fall as water from the clouds.

sentences.english: a night of wind and rain
sentences.chinese: 风雨交加的夜晚

sentences.english: There will be heavy rain in most parts of the country.
sentences.chinese: 全国大部分地区将有大雨。

sentences.english: Outside it was still raining.
sentences.chinese: 外面仍在下雨。

detailed_translations.english: water that falls in small drops from clouds in the sky
if it rains, drops of water fall from clouds in the sky

name: wall
trans: To wall is to enclose or separate with a wall.

sentences.english: the Great Wall of China
sentences.chinese: 中国的长城

sentences.english: We climbed over the wall into the orchard.
sentences.chinese: 我们翻墙进了果园。

detailed_translations.english: an upright flat structure made of stone or brick, that divides one area from another or surrounds an area

name: base
trans: To base is to use as a foundation or starting point.

sentences.english: India has a good scientific research base.
sentences.chinese: 印度有良好的科研基础。

detailed_translations.english: the most important part of something, from which new ideas develop
not having good moral principles
to have your main place of work, business etc in a particular place

name: damage
trans: To damage is to harm or impair something.

sentences.english: insects that damage crops
sentences.chinese: 破坏庄稼的昆虫

sentences.english: There may be permanent brain damage.
sentences.chinese: 可能有永久性脑损伤。

detailed_translations.english: to cause physical harm to something or to part of someone’s body
physical harm that is done to something or to a part of someone’s body, so that it is broken or injured

name: distance
trans: To distance is to move away from something or someone.

sentences.english: Measure the distance between the two points.
sentences.chinese: 量出两点之间的距离。

sentences.english: The cottage is some distance (= quite a long distance ) from the road.
sentences.chinese: 小屋离开大路有些距离。

sentences.english: Church bells rang in the distance (= they were far away ) .
sentences.chinese: 远处教堂的钟声响起。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of space between two places or things

name: pair
trans: To pair is to match or group together in sets of two.

sentences.english: earrings, £5 a pair
sentences.chinese: 耳环，5英镑一副

sentences.english: We were each paired with a newcomer to help with training.
sentences.chinese: 我们每个人都和一名新手组对，帮助他们训练。

detailed_translations.english: two things of the same type that are used together
to put people or things into groups of two, or to form groups of two

name: staff
trans: To staff is to provide with workers or employees.

sentences.english: The staff were very good.
sentences.chinese: 员工们都很棒。

sentences.english: 10 staff were allocated to the task.
sentences.chinese: 10名员工被分派做这项任务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 全体职员，员工；工作人员；参谋
detailed_translations.english: the people who work for an organization

name: sugar
trans: To sugar is to add sugar to something.

sentences.english: Do you take sugar in your coffee?
sentences.chinese: 你的咖啡加糖吗？

detailed_translations.english: a sweet white or brown substance that is obtained from plants and used to make food and drinks sweet
to add sugar or cover something with sugar

name: target
trans: To target is to aim at or focus on a particular object or goal.

sentences.english: There is no target date for completion of the new project.
sentences.chinese: 这个新的项目何时完工没有预定日期。

sentences.english: The government may fail to meet (= achieve ) its target of recycling 25% of domestic waste.
sentences.chinese: 政府可能达不到回收利用25%的生活垃圾的目标。

sentences.english: Jiang set annual growth targets of 8–9%.
sentences.chinese: 江确定了8%至9%的年增长目标。

detailed_translations.english: something that you are trying to achieve, such as a total, an amount, or a time
to make something have an effect on a particular limited group or area

name: text
trans: To text is to send a message via text message.

sentences.english: a chemistry text
sentences.chinese: 化学课本

detailed_translations.english: a textbook
to send someone a written message on a  mobile phone

name: author
trans: To author is to write or create something, such as a book or article.

sentences.english: Nothomb is a Belgian author.
sentences.chinese: 诺东是位比利时作家。

sentences.english: It’s clear that the author is a woman.
sentences.chinese: 显然，这位作者是女性。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has written a book

name: complicated
trans: To complicate is to make something more difficult or complex.

sentences.english: a complicated pattern
sentences.chinese: 复杂的图案

sentences.english: The human brain is an incredibly complicated organ.
sentences.chinese: 人脑是一个结构极其复杂的器官。

detailed_translations.english: consisting of many closely connected parts

name: discount
trans: To discount is to offer a reduced price or value for something.

sentences.english: They are often available at a discount.
sentences.chinese: 它们经常可以以折扣价买到。

sentences.english: This has forced airlines to discount fares heavily in order to spur demand.
sentences.chinese: 这已经迫使多家航空公司对机票大幅打折以刺激需求。

detailed_translations.english: a reduction in the usual price of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 将…打折扣； 不信； 漠视， 低估
detailed_translations.english: If a shop or company discounts an amount or percentage from something that they are selling, they take the amount or percentage off the usual price

name: file
trans: To file is to organize or store information or documents.

sentences.english: We will keep your details on file (= store them for later use ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们将把你的详细资料存档。

sentences.english: The contracts are filed alphabetically.
sentences.chinese: 这些合同是按字母顺序归档的。

detailed_translations.english: a set of papers, records etc that contain information about a particular person or subject
to keep papers, documents etc in a particular place so that you can find them easily

name: ground
trans: To ground is to connect to the earth or provide a basis for something.

sentences.english: I found her lying on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 我发现她躺在地上。

sentences.english: a football/recreation/sports, etc. ground
sentences.chinese: 足球场、娱乐场地、运动场等

sentences.english: There are strong grounds for believing his statement.
sentences.chinese: 有充分的理由可以相信他的话。

sentences.english: ‘You’re under arrest.’ ‘On what grounds?’
sentences.chinese: “你被捕了。”“理由是什么？”

detailed_translations.english: the solid surface of the earth

name: lesson
trans: To lesson is to reduce or decrease something, such as pain or difficulty.

sentences.english: piano lessons
sentences.chinese: 钢琴课

detailed_translations.english: a period of time in which someone is taught a particular skill, for example how to play a musical instrument or drive a car

name: officer
trans: To officer is to hold a position of authority or power.

sentences.english: a former Cabinet officer
sentences.chinese: 前内阁官员

sentences.english: a commanding officer of the SAS
sentences.chinese: 英国空军特种部队的一名指挥官

detailed_translations.english: someone who is in a position in an organization or the government

name: phase
trans: To phase is to gradually introduce or transition from one thing to another.

sentences.english: a new drug that is in the experimental phase
sentences.chinese: 处于试验阶段的一种新药

sentences.english: It’s just a phase he’s going through.
sentences.chinese: 这只是他要经历的一个阶段。

detailed_translations.english: one of the stages of a process of development or change

name: reference
trans: To reference is to mention or allude to something.

sentences.english: Keep their price list on file for future reference (= so that it can be looked at in the future ) ..
sentences.chinese: 将他们的价目表存档，以供日后参考。

sentences.english: There is no direct reference to her own childhood in the novel.
sentences.chinese: 小说里没有直接提及她自己的童年。

detailed_translations.english: the act of looking at sth for information

name: register
trans: To register is to record or sign up for something.

sentences.english: Have you signed the hotel register ?
sentences.chinese: 你在酒店登记簿上签名了吗？

sentences.english: Police want a national register of DNA samples.
sentences.chinese: 警方想要一个全国范围的DNA样本登记册。

sentences.english: How many students have registered for English classes?
sentences.chinese: 有多少学生注册选修英语课了？

detailed_translations.english: an official list of names of people, companies etc, or a book that has this list
to put someone’s or something’s name on an official list

name: secure
trans: To secure is to make something safe or secure from harm.

sentences.english: There are no secure jobs these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今已经没有铁饭碗了。

sentences.english: We want a secure future for our children.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望我们的孩子未来生活无虞。

sentences.english: United’s position at the top of the league seems relatively secure.
sentences.chinese: 联队在联赛中的头名位置似乎相对稳固。

detailed_translations.english: a situation that is secure is one that you can depend on because it is not likely to change
to make something safe from being attacked, harmed, or lost

name: sky
trans: To sky is to fly or soar in the sky.

sentences.english: The sky grew dark, and a cold rain began to fall.
sentences.chinese: 天色转暗，开始下起冰冷的雨来。

sentences.english: A shooting star sped across the sky.
sentences.chinese: 一颗流星划过天空。

detailed_translations.english: the space above the earth where clouds and the sun and stars appear

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…投向空中；把…挂得过高

name: stage
trans: To stage is to organize or plan an event or performance.

sentences.english: We’re getting to the stage where we hardly ever go out together.
sentences.chinese: 我们快要到几乎不一起外出的地步了。

sentences.english: She is on stage for most of the play.
sentences.chinese: 这出戏的大部分时间里她都在台上

detailed_translations.english: a particular time or state that something reaches as it grows or develops

name: stick
trans: To stick is to attach or adhere something to another surface.

sentences.english: a pair of drum sticks
sentences.chinese: 一对鼓槌

sentences.english: a measuring stick
sentences.chinese: 量尺

sentences.english: Aunt Lou walks with a stick (= uses a stick to help her walk ) .
sentences.chinese: 卢姑妈走路要拄拐棍。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin piece of wood, plastic etc that you use for a particular purpose
if a pointed object sticks into something, or if you stick it there, it is pushed into it

name: title
trans: To title is to give a name or title to something.

sentences.english: "Patience and Sarah" was first published in 1969 under the title "A Place for Us."
sentences.chinese: 《耐心与萨拉》于1969年以《我们的地方》为书名首次出版。

sentences.english: Pirandello titled his play "Six Characters in Search of an Author."
sentences.chinese: 皮兰德娄将其戏剧命名为《六个寻找作者的剧中人》。

sentences.english: The single is titled "White Love."
sentences.chinese: 这支单曲名为《白色之恋》。

detailed_translations.chinese: 冠军；标题；头衔；权利；字幕
detailed_translations.english: the name given to a particular book, painting, play etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 加标题于；赋予头衔；把…称为
detailed_translations.english: When a writer, composer, or artist titles a work, they give it a name

name: trouble
trans: To trouble is to cause difficulty or problems for someone or something.

sentences.english: Recent stock market losses point to trouble ahead.
sentences.chinese: 最近股市的下跌预示着未来将有麻烦。

detailed_translations.english: problems or difficulties
to say something or ask someone to do something which may use or waste their time or upset them

name: advanced
trans: To advance is to move forward or progress in a particular direction.

sentences.english: advanced learners of English
sentences.chinese: 高级程度的英语学习者

sentences.english: advanced physics
sentences.chinese: 高等物理（学）

detailed_translations.english: studying or dealing with a school subject at a difficult level

name: bowl
trans: To bowl is to throw or roll a ball towards a target.

sentences.english: Mix all the ingredients thoroughly in a large bowl.
sentences.chinese: 将所有配料放在大碗里搅拌均匀。

sentences.english: Fill the bowl with water.
sentences.chinese: 在碗里装满水。

detailed_translations.english: a wide round container that is open at the top, used to hold liquids, food, flowers etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 玩保龄球；滑动；平稳快速移动
detailed_translations.english: to travel along very quickly and smoothly

name: bridge
trans: To bridge is to connect or link two things together.

sentences.english: He walked back over the railway bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他从铁路桥上走了回去。

sentences.english: They recreate themselves with playing bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他们以打桥牌作消遣。

detailed_translations.english: a structure built over a river, road etc that allows people or vehicles to cross from one side to the other

name: campaign
trans: To campaign is to promote or advertise a cause or idea.

sentences.english: Jones ran a good campaign.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯的活动搞得很成功。

sentences.english: Police have launched a campaign to crack down on drug dealers.
sentences.chinese: 警方发起了一场严厉打击毒贩的运动。

detailed_translations.english: a series of actions intended to achieve a particular result relating to politics or business, or a social improvement

name: club
trans: To club is to strike or hit with a club or similar object.

sentences.english: Manchester United Football Club
sentences.chinese: 曼联（队）足球俱乐部

sentences.english: Shall we go to a club?
sentences.chinese: 我们去夜总会怎样？

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔职业体育的〕俱乐部；俱乐部；夜总会
detailed_translations.english: a professional organization including the players, managers, and owners of a sports team

name: edge
trans: To edge is to move or position gradually towards a particular direction or goal.

sentences.english: Put the eggs in the centre of the dish, with the vegetables and herbs around the edge.
sentences.chinese: 把鸡蛋放在盘子中间，盘边一圈放些蔬菜和香草。

sentences.english: He stood at the water’s edge staring across the lake.
sentences.chinese: 他站在水边，凝视着湖对面。

sentences.english: A leaf was on the ground, curling up at the edges.
sentences.chinese: 地上有一片叶子，叶边卷曲着。

sentences.english: a knife with a sharp edge
sentences.chinese: 刀刃锋利的小刀

detailed_translations.english: the part of an object that is furthest from its centre

name: evidence
trans: To evidence is to show or provide proof or evidence of something.

sentences.english: We found further scientific evidence for this theory.
sentences.chinese: 我们找到了进一步证实这种理论的科学根据。

sentences.english: I was asked to give evidence (= to say what I knew, describe what I had seen, etc.)
sentences.chinese: 我被要求出庭作证。

detailed_translations.english: facts or signs that show clearly that something exists or is true

name: fan
trans: To fan is to cause air or wind to blow on something.

sentences.english: Groups of football fans began heading towards the ground.
sentences.chinese: 成群结队的球迷开始向球场走去。

detailed_translations.english: someone who likes a particular sport or performing art very much, or who admires a famous person

name: letter
trans: To letter is to form or write letters or words.

sentences.english: I got a letter from Melanie today.
sentences.chinese: 今天我收到梅拉妮的一封信。

sentences.english: There are 26 letters in the English alphabet.
sentences.chinese: 英语字母表有26个字母。

detailed_translations.english: a written or printed message that is usually put in an envelope and sent by mail

name: lock
trans: To lock is to fasten or secure with a lock.

sentences.english: I’m sorry, there isn’t a lock on the bathroom door.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，浴室门上没有锁。

sentences.english: The key turned stiffly in the lock.
sentences.chinese: 这把钥匙开锁不灵活。

sentences.english: a bike lock
sentences.chinese: 自行车锁

sentences.english: Did you lock the car?
sentences.chinese: 你把汽车锁好了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a thing that keeps a door, drawer etc fastened and is usually opened with a key or by moving a small metal bar
to fasten something, usually with a key, so that other people cannot open it, or to be fastened like this

name: option
trans: To option is to choose or select from a range of options or choices.

sentences.english: There are a number of options available.
sentences.chinese: 有多种选择。

sentences.english: He had two options.
sentences.chinese: 他有两种选择。

sentences.english: This was not the only option open to him.
sentences.chinese: 这并非是他的唯一选择。

sentences.english: Teenage mothers often have no option but to (= have no other choice except to ) live with their parents.
sentences.chinese: 少女妈妈往往别无选择，只能与父母同住。

detailed_translations.chinese: 选择， 选择权， 选择自由； 选择的事物， 选课
detailed_translations.english: a choice you can make in a particular situation

name: organized
trans: To organize is to arrange or order things in a particular way.

name: pack
trans: To pack is to put items into a container or bag for transportation.

sentences.english: I forgot to pack my razor.
sentences.chinese: 我忘记把剃须刀放入行李包了。

sentences.english: Hundreds of people packed into the mosque.
sentences.chinese: 成百上千的人挤进了清真寺。

sentences.english: Send away for your free information pack today.
sentences.chinese: 今天就来函索取免费资料包吧。

detailed_translations.english: to put things into cases, bags etc ready for a trip somewhere
something wrapped in paper or packed in a box and then sent by post or taken somewhere

name: park
trans: To park is to leave a vehicle or object in a designated parking space.

sentences.english: Let’s go for a walk in the park.
sentences.chinese: 我们去公园散步吧。

sentences.english: a park bench
sentences.chinese: 公园长椅

sentences.english: a flat overlooking Hyde Park
sentences.chinese: 一套可以俯瞰海德公园的公寓

detailed_translations.english: a large open area with grass and trees, especially in a town, where people can walk, play games etc

name: quarter
trans: To quarter is to divide something into four equal parts.

sentences.english: It’s about a page and a quarter.
sentences.chinese: 大概是一又四分之一页。

sentences.english: Cut the cake into quarters.
sentences.chinese: 把蛋糕切成四等份。

sentences.english: I’ll meet you in a quarter of an hour.
sentences.chinese: 我们一刻钟之后见。

detailed_translations.english: one of four equal parts into which something can be divided

name: skin
trans: To skin is to remove the skin from something, typically an animal or fruit.

sentences.english: She had thick black hair and smooth dark skin.
sentences.chinese: 她一头浓密的黑发，皮肤黝黑光滑。

sentences.english: The skin on his hands was dry and rough.
sentences.chinese: 他手上的皮肤干燥粗糙。

detailed_translations.english: the natural outer layer of a person’s or animal’s body
to remove the skin from an animal, fruit, or vegetable

name: sort
trans: To sort is to separate or arrange things into different categories or groups.

sentences.english: Most of the victims developed psychological problems of one sort or another (= of various different types ).
sentences.chinese: 大多数受害者都出现了这样那样的心理问题。

sentences.english: They do burgers, pizzas, that sort of thing.
sentences.chinese: 他们供应汉堡包、比萨饼什么的。

sentences.english: The eggs are sorted according to size.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸡蛋是按大小分类的。

detailed_translations.english: a group or class of people, things etc that have similar qualities or features
to put things in a particular order or arrange them in groups according to size, type etc

name: weight
trans: To weight is to measure or determine the weight of something.

sentences.english: The average weight of a baby at birth is just over seven pounds.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿的平均出生体重是七磅多一点。

sentences.english: It can be sewn into curtain hems to weight the curtain and so allow it to hang better.
sentences.chinese: 可以把它缝在窗帘的摺边里以增加窗帘的重量，使之更有下垂感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重量，重力；负担；砝码；重要性
detailed_translations.english: how heavy something is when you measure it
If you weight something, you make it heavier by adding something to it, for example, in order to stop it from moving easily

name: baby
trans: To baby is to care for and treat with gentleness, like an infant or young child.

sentences.english: Clare is the baby of the family.
sentences.chinese: 克莱尔是家里最小的孩子。

detailed_translations.english: a younger child in a family, often the youngest

name: carry
trans: To carry is to hold and move something from one place to another.

sentences.english: The morning paper carried a story about demonstrations in New York and Washington D.C.
sentences.chinese: 晨报登载了纽约和华盛顿特区举行示威游行的报道。

sentences.english: The national TV network carries religious programmes.
sentences.chinese: 全国电视网播出宗教节目。

detailed_translations.english: if a newspaper, a television or radio broadcast, or a website carries a piece of news, an advertisement etc, it prints it or broadcasts it

name: dish
trans: To dish is to serve food on a plate or dish.

sentences.english: a serving dish
sentences.chinese: 上菜用的盘子

sentences.english: an ovenproof dish
sentences.chinese: 耐热盘

sentences.english: The menu includes a wide selection of vegetarian dishes.
sentences.chinese: 菜单上有品种丰富的素食。

detailed_translations.english: a flat container with low sides, for serving food from or cooking food in

name: exact
trans: To exact is to demand and require something to be done precisely and accurately.

sentences.english: Police are still investigating the exact cause of the accident.
sentences.chinese: 警方还在调查这起事故的确切原因。

sentences.english: What were his exact words?
sentences.chinese: 他的原话是什么？

sentences.english: The timing had to be exact.
sentences.chinese: 对时机的把握必须精确。

sentences.english: Some concepts in Chinese medicine have no exact equivalent in Western medicine.
sentences.chinese: 中医的一些概念在西医中没有完全一样的对应观念。

detailed_translations.english: completely correct in every detail
to demand and get something from someone by using threats, force etc

name: factor
trans: To factor is to consider and include something as an important part of a decision or calculation.

sentences.english: The rise in crime is mainly due to social and economic factors.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率上升主要由社会和经济因素造成。

detailed_translations.chinese: 因素， 因子； 系数
detailed_translations.english: one of several things that influence or cause a situation

name: fruit
trans: To fruit is to produce fruit or a result from one's efforts or actions.

sentences.english: Try to eat plenty of fresh fruit .
sentences.chinese: 尽量多吃新鲜水果。

sentences.english: fruit and vegetables
sentences.chinese: 水果和蔬菜

sentences.english: a glass of fruit juice
sentences.chinese: 一杯果汁

sentences.english: a large garden with fruit trees
sentences.chinese: 种了果树的大花园

sentences.english: I’m looking forward to retirement and having time to enjoy the fruits of my labour (= the results of my hard work ) .
sentences.chinese: 我盼望着退休，好有时间来享受自己的劳动成果。

detailed_translations.english: something that grows on a plant, tree, or bush, can be eaten as a food, contains seeds or a stone, and is usually sweet

name: muscle
trans: To muscle is to use physical strength to move or lift something.

sentences.english: Relax your stomach muscles , then stretch again.
sentences.chinese: 放松腹部肌肉，然后再绷紧。

sentences.english: Regular exercise will help to strengthen your muscles .
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼有助于强健肌肉。

sentences.english: It took muscle to work in an old-fashioned kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 在老式厨房里干活很费力。

detailed_translations.english: one of the pieces of flesh inside your body that you use in order to move, and that connect your bones together

name: traffic
trans: To traffic is to move goods or people from one place to another, especially on a regular basis.

sentences.english: There wasn’t much traffic on the roads.
sentences.chinese: 路上车辆不多。

sentences.english: The sound of the traffic kept me awake.
sentences.chinese: 车辆来往的嘈杂声令我无法入睡。

detailed_translations.english: the vehicles moving along a road or street

name: trip
trans: To trip is to stumble or lose balance while walking or running.

sentences.english: Two lucky employees won a round-the-world trip.
sentences.chinese: 两名幸运的雇员赢得一次环游世界的机会。

sentences.english: It’s an 80-mile round trip (= a journey to a place and back again ) to Exeter.
sentences.chinese: 到埃克塞特往返有80英里。

sentences.english: I’m afraid you’ve had a wasted trip (= a trip in which you do not achieve your purpose ) . Mr Burgess has already left.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕你是白来一趟了，伯吉斯先生已经走了。

sentences.english: He was unable to make the trip to accept the award.
sentences.chinese: 他无法前去领奖。

detailed_translations.english: a visit to a place that involves a journey, for pleasure or a particular purpose
to hit something with your foot by accident so that you fall or almost fall

name: appeal
trans: To appeal is to request or seek for a favorable decision or action.

sentences.english: The girl’s family have made a public appeal for help to try and catch her killer.
sentences.chinese: 那名遇害女孩的家人吁请公众协助捉拿凶手。

sentences.english: an appeal to the European Court of Human Rights
sentences.chinese: 向欧洲人权法庭提出的上诉

sentences.english: Farmers have appealed to the government for help.
sentences.chinese: 农场主请求政府帮助。

sentences.english: She is not happy with the decision and plans to appeal.
sentences.chinese: 她不服判决，打算上诉

detailed_translations.english: an urgent request for something important
to make a serious public request for help, money, information etc

name: chart
trans: To chart is to create a visual representation of data or information.

sentences.english: a chart showing last year’s sales
sentences.chinese: 显示去年销售情况的一份图表

sentences.english: a weather chart
sentences.chinese: 天气图

sentences.english: the theatre’s seating chart
sentences.chinese: 剧场的座位图

detailed_translations.english: information that is clearly arranged in the form of a simple picture, set of figures,  graph  etc, or a piece of paper with this information on it

detailed_translations.chinese: 用图表表示， 在图上表示
detailed_translations.english: if a record charts, it enters the weekly list of the most popular records

name: gear
trans: To gear is to adjust or adapt to a particular situation or purpose.

sentences.english: His mountain bike had 18 gears.
sentences.chinese: 他的山地自行车有18挡。

sentences.english: Andy drove cautiously along in third gear.
sentences.chinese: 安迪挂着三挡小心地行驶。

sentences.english: Does this thing have a reverse gear?
sentences.chinese: 这玩意儿有倒挡吗？

sentences.english: Any cyclist can climb a difficult hill; you just change gear.
sentences.chinese: 谁都能骑上难爬的山坡，只要换挡就行了。

sentences.english: Don’t turn off the engine while you’re still in gear.
sentences.chinese: 还挂着挡的时候不要关发动机。

sentences.english: It’s a good habit to take the car out of gear while you’re at a stoplight.
sentences.chinese: 等红灯时换空挡的习惯很好。

sentences.english: Colleges are not always geared to the needs of mature students.
sentences.chinese: 大学并不总是去适应成年学生的需要。

sentences.english: My training was geared toward winning gold.
sentences.chinese: 我的训练是为赢得金牌去规划的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 齿轮，传动装置，排挡；用具，设备；衣服
detailed_translations.english: the machinery in a vehicle such as a car, truck, or bicycle that you use to go comfortably at different speeds
If someone or something is geared to or toward a particular purpose, they are organized or designed in order to achieve that purpose

name: land
trans: To land is to touch down or arrive on the ground or surface.

sentences.english: They own a lot of land.
sentences.chinese: 他们拥有许多土地。

sentences.english: He bought a piece of land.
sentences.chinese: 他买了一块地。

sentences.english: After 21 days at sea, we sighted land.
sentences.chinese: 经过21天的海上航行，我们见到了陆地。

detailed_translations.english: an area of ground, especially when used for farming or building

name: log
trans: To log is to record or document events or information.

sentences.english: a roaring log fire
sentences.chinese: 原木燃烧的熊熊大火

detailed_translations.english: a thick piece of wood from a tree
to make an official record of events, facts etc

name: lost
trans: To lose is to no longer have something that one had before.

sentences.english: ‘Are you lost?’ the driver asked.
sentences.chinese: “你迷路了吗？”司机问道。

sentences.english: I got thoroughly lost on the way here.
sentences.chinese: 我来这里时完全迷了路。

sentences.english: a lost child
sentences.chinese: 一个走失的孩子

detailed_translations.english: if you are lost, you do not know where you are and are unable to find your way somewhere

name: net
trans: To net is to catch or acquire something, especially something valuable.

sentences.english: We netted three fish in under an hour.
sentences.chinese: 不到一小时我们就网住了三条鱼。

detailed_translations.english: to catch sth, especially fish, in a net

name: season
trans: To season is to add flavor or enhance the taste of food with spices or herbs.

sentences.english: the effect on plants as the seasons start to change
sentences.chinese: 换季对植物的影响

detailed_translations.english: one of the main periods into which a year is divided, each of which has a particular type of weather. The seasons are spring, summer, autumn, and winter
to add salt, pepper etc to food you are cooking

name: spirit
trans: To spirit is to carry away or move something quickly and secretly.

sentences.english: His spirits were so low (= he was so sad ) that he refused to answer his phone.
sentences.chinese: 他情绪非常低落，连电话也不愿接。

detailed_translations.chinese: 精神；心灵；情绪；志气；烈酒
detailed_translations.english: the qualities that make someone live the way they do, and make them different from other people

name: tree
trans: To tree is to climb up and perch oneself in a tree.

sentences.english: As a kid, I loved to climb trees.
sentences.chinese: 小时候，我喜欢爬树。

sentences.english: the trunk of an old oak tree (= the main central part, from which the branches grow )
sentences.chinese: 一棵老橡树的树干

detailed_translations.english: a very tall plant that has branches and leaves, and lives for many years

name: wave
trans: To wave is to move one's hand or arm back and forth to signal or greet someone.

sentences.english: Dee watched the waves breaking on the shore.
sentences.chinese: 迪伊凝视着拍岸的波涛。

sentences.english: The ship tipped over, and finally vanished beneath the waves.
sentences.chinese: 船倾覆了，最终沉没在海浪之下。

detailed_translations.english: a line of raised water that moves across the surface of the sea
if you wave something, or if it waves, it moves from side to side

name: belt
trans: To belt is to fasten or secure something with a belt.

sentences.english: He unbuckled his leather belt.
sentences.chinese: 他解开皮带。

detailed_translations.english: a band of leather, cloth etc that you wear around your waist to hold up your clothes or for decoration

detailed_translations.chinese: 用带子系住；用皮带抽打
detailed_translations.english: to fasten something with a belt

name: bench
trans: To bench is to put someone on a bench, or to exclude someone from a team or activity.

sentences.english: We sat on a park bench.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐在公园的长椅上。

detailed_translations.english: a long seat for two or more people, especially outdoors

name: closed
trans: To close is to shut or seal something so that it is no longer open or accessible.

name: commission
trans: To commission is to assign or authorize someone to perform a task or create something.

sentences.english: The Government set up a commission to investigate allegations of police violence.
sentences.chinese: 政府成立了一个委员会调查对警察施暴行为的指控。

detailed_translations.chinese: 委任状；委员会；佣金，回扣；授权，委托
detailed_translations.english: a group of people who have been given the official job of finding out about something or controlling something
to formally ask someone to write an official report, produce a work of art for you etc

name: copy
trans: To copy is to duplicate or reproduce something exactly.

sentences.english: back-up copies of your files
sentences.chinese: 你的文档的备份

sentences.english: Could you copy this letter and send it out, please?
sentences.chinese: 你能把这封信复印一份发出去吗？

detailed_translations.english: something that is made to be exactly like another thing
to deliberately make or produce something that is exactly like another thing

name: drop
trans: To drop is to let something fall or release it from one's hand.

sentences.english: Your button has dropped off.
sentences.chinese: 你的纽扣掉了。

sentences.english: The number of deaths on the roads has dropped sharply.
sentences.chinese: 交通事故死亡人数已大大减少。

detailed_translations.english: to fall suddenly onto the ground or into something

name: firm
trans: To firm is to make something more solid or rigid.

sentences.english: She works for an electronics firm.
sentences.chinese: 她在一家电子公司工作。

detailed_translations.english: a business or company, especially a small one

name: frequent
trans: To frequent is to visit or go to a place often or regularly.

sentences.english: Trains rushed past at frequent intervals .
sentences.chinese: 火车频频驶过。

sentences.english: She was a frequent visitor to the house.
sentences.chinese: 她是家里的常客。

detailed_translations.english: happening or doing something often
to go to a particular place often

name: progress
trans: To progress is to move forward or make advancement in something.

sentences.english: The police are disappointed by the slow pro-gress of the investigation.
sentences.chinese: 警方对调查进度缓慢感到失望。

sentences.english: We made good progress despite the snow.
sentences.chinese: 尽管下雪，我们的行程还是很顺利。

sentences.english: I asked the nurse how my son was progressing.
sentences.chinese: 我询问护士我儿子身体恢复得如何。

detailed_translations.english: the process of getting better at doing something, or getting closer to finishing or achieving something
to improve, develop, or achieve things so that you are then at a more advanced stage

name: project
trans: To project is to plan or estimate something for the future.

sentences.english: The project aims to provide an analysis of children’s emotions.
sentences.chinese: 该计划旨在对儿童情绪作出分析。

sentences.english: a three-year research project
sentences.chinese: 一项为期三年的研究计划

sentences.english: The scheme will now be extended after a successful pilot project (= a small trial to test if an idea will be successful ) .
sentences.chinese: 试行成功后，该方案现在将得到推广。

sentences.english: The project is funded by Wellcome plc.
sentences.chinese: 这个项目由威康公司资助。

sentences.english: a project manager
sentences.chinese: 项目经理

sentences.english: a geography project
sentences.chinese: 一个地理课题

detailed_translations.english: a carefully planned piece of work to get information about something, to build something, to improve something etc

name: stuff
trans: To stuff is to fill something tightly with material or substance.

sentences.english: I’ve got some sticky stuff on my shoe.
sentences.chinese: 我鞋子上有什么黏糊糊的东西。

sentences.english: How do you think you’re going to fit all that stuff into the car?
sentences.chinese: 你说这么多东西你怎么装进车里？

sentences.english: I felt sorry for the ones who had to eat the awful stuff.
sentences.chinese: 我很同情那些只能吃这种难吃东西的人。

sentences.english: Where’s all the camping stuff?
sentences.chinese: 野营用的东西都在哪儿？

detailed_translations.english: used when you are talking about things such as substances, materials, or groups of objects when you do not know what they are called, or it is not important to say exactly what they are

name: ticket
trans: To ticket is to issue or give someone a ticket for a violation or admission to an event.

sentences.english: Slow down or you'll get a ticket.
sentences.chinese: 开慢点儿，否则你会接到一张罚款通知单。

sentences.english: parking/speeding ticket
sentences.chinese: 违法停车/超速行驶罚款单

detailed_translations.english: a printed note ordering you to pay money because you have done something illegal while driving or parking your car

name: tour
trans: To tour is to visit and explore different places, often as part of a group.

sentences.english: We met on a coach tour in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 我们是在意大利乘长途客车旅游时相识的。

detailed_translations.english: a journey for pleasure, during which you visit several different towns, areas etc

name: angle
trans: To angle is to fish with a rod and line or to position oneself for a particular view or advantage.

sentences.english: You didn’t measure the angle accurately.
sentences.chinese: 你没有量准角度。

detailed_translations.english: the space between two straight lines or surfaces that join each other, measured in degrees

name: blue
trans: To blue is to make something blue in color or to become sad or depressed.

sentences.english: the blue waters of the lake
sentences.chinese: 蓝蓝的湖水

sentences.english: She nearly always dresses in blue.
sentences.chinese: 她几乎总是穿蓝色的衣服。

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of the sky or the sea on a fine day
the colour of the sky or the sea on a fine day

name: breakfast
trans: To breakfast is to eat breakfast, typically in the morning.

sentences.english: We had bacon and eggs for breakfast .
sentences.chinese: 我们早餐吃了熏肉鸡蛋。

sentences.english: I never eat breakfast .
sentences.chinese: 我从来不吃早饭。

sentences.english: After a hearty breakfast (=  large breakfast  ) , we set out for a hike.
sentences.chinese: 我们吃了一顿丰盛的早餐，然后出发去远足了。

sentences.english: a light breakfast
sentences.chinese: 简单的早餐

sentences.english: a working breakfast
sentences.chinese: 工作早餐

detailed_translations.english: the meal you have in the morning

name: doctor
trans: To doctor is to treat or care for a medical condition or to falsify or manipulate something in a deceptive manner.

sentences.english: She was treated by her local doctor.
sentences.chinese: 她由她的本区医生治疗。

sentences.english: I’d like to make an appointment to see Dr Pugh.
sentences.chinese: 我想预约看皮尤医生。

sentences.english: a Doctor of Law
sentences.chinese: 法学博士

detailed_translations.english: someone who is trained to treat people who are ill

name: dot
trans: To dot is to mark or cover something with small spots or dots.

sentences.english: a pattern of dots
sentences.chinese: 圆点图案

sentences.english: She never dots her i’s.
sentences.chinese: 她从来不在i上面加点。

detailed_translations.english: a small round mark or spot
to mark something by putting a dot on it or above it

name: dream
trans: To dream is to experience a series of thoughts, images, and sensations while sleeping.

sentences.english: I had lots of dreams last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我做了很多梦。

sentences.english: Her dream is to make a movie.
sentences.chinese: 她的梦想是要拍一部电影。

sentences.english: It’s quite common to dream that you’re falling.
sentences.chinese: 梦到自己坠落是常有的事。

detailed_translations.english: a series of thoughts, images, and feelings that you experience when you are asleep
to have a dream while you are asleep

name: essay
trans: To essay is to attempt or try something, especially in writing or speaking, with the aim of conveying one's ideas or opinions.

sentences.english: an essay on Bernard Shaw
sentences.chinese: 关于萧伯纳的文章

sentences.english: We asked Jason to write an essay about his hometown.
sentences.chinese: 我们让杰森写一篇关于他家乡的短文。

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of writing about a particular subject by a student as part of a course of study

name: father
trans: To father is to be the biological or adoptive father of a child or to create, initiate, or establish something.

sentences.english: Ask your father to help you.
sentences.chinese: 叫你父亲帮你。

sentences.english: Andrew was very excited about becoming a father.
sentences.chinese: 安德鲁初为人父，非常激动。

sentences.english: I have sinned, Father.
sentences.chinese: 我有罪，神父。

sentences.english: Freud is the father of psychoanalysis.
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德是精神分析之父。

detailed_translations.english: a male parent

name: fee
trans: To fee is to pay a fee or charge for a service or product.

sentences.english: You can use the gym and pool for a fee of £35 a month.
sentences.chinese: 月付35英镑，即可使用健身房和游泳池。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that you pay to do something or that you pay to a professional person for their work

name: finance
trans: To finance is to provide or obtain funding or financial resources for something.

sentences.english: leasing and other forms of business finance
sentences.chinese: 租赁及其他商业金融形式

sentences.english: Russia’s finance minister
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯财政部长

sentences.english: the world of high finance
sentences.chinese: 高级金融界

detailed_translations.chinese: 财政，金融；财源，财务情况
detailed_translations.english: the management of money by governments, large organizations etc
to provide money, especially a lot of money, to pay for something

name: juice
trans: To juice is to extract juice from fruit or vegetables or to enhance something with energy or excitement.

sentences.english: a carton of orange juice
sentences.chinese: 一纸盒橙汁

sentences.english: A Coke and a tomato juice, please.
sentences.chinese: 请来一杯可乐和一杯番茄汁。

detailed_translations.english: the liquid that comes from fruit and vegetables, or a drink that is made from this

name: limit
trans: To limit is to set a boundary or restriction on something.

sentences.english: a 55 mph speed limit
sentences.chinese: 55英里的时速限制

sentences.english: The public is not allowed within a 2-mile limit of the missile site.
sentences.chinese: 众不得进入导弹发射场两英里范围内。

detailed_translations.english: the greatest or least amount, number, speed etc that is allowed

name: luck
trans: To luck is to have good or bad fortune or chance in a particular situation.

sentences.english: You’re not having much luck today, are you?
sentences.chinese: 你今天运气不太好，是不是？

sentences.english: He’s had good luck with his roses this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年他种玫瑰的运气不错。

sentences.english: It was an incredible piece of luck.
sentences.chinese: 真是令人难以置信的好运气。

sentences.english: Roulette is a game of luck.
sentences.chinese: 轮盘赌是个靠运气的游戏。

detailed_translations.english: good things that happen to you by chance

name: milk
trans: To milk is to extract milk from an animal, typically a cow, or to exploit or take advantage of something excessively.

sentences.english: a bottle of milk
sentences.chinese: 一瓶奶

sentences.english: Would you like some milk in your tea?
sentences.chinese: 你茶里要加点奶吗？

sentences.english: a pint of semi-skimmed milk
sentences.chinese: 一品脱半脱脂奶

sentences.english: I helped to milk the cows.
sentences.chinese: 我帮忙挤牛奶。

detailed_translations.english: a white liquid produced by cows or goats that is drunk by people
to take milk from a cow or goat

name: mixed
trans: To mix is to combine different substances or elements to create a new and blended product or result.

name: mouth
trans: To mouth is to form words or sounds with one's mouth or to speak insincerely or hypocritically.

sentences.english: He lifted his glass to his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 他把玻璃杯举到嘴边。

sentences.english: Liam was fast asleep with his mouth wide open.
sentences.chinese: 利亚姆大张着嘴，睡得很熟。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your face which you put food into, or which you use for speaking

name: pipe
trans: To pipe is to transport a liquid or gas through a pipe or to play a musical instrument, such as a pipe or flute.

sentences.english: a water pipe
sentences.chinese: 水管

sentences.english: a frozen waste pipe
sentences.chinese: 冻住的污水管

sentences.english: copper pipes
sentences.chinese: 铜管

sentences.english: A pipe had burst in the kitchen and flooded the floor.
sentences.chinese: 厨房的一根管道爆裂，弄得满地都是水。

detailed_translations.english: a tube through which a liquid or gas flows
to make a musical sound, using a pipe

name: please
trans: To please is to make someone happy or satisfied.

sentences.english: a business that wants to please its customers
sentences.chinese: 希望让顾客满意的一家公司

sentences.english: She did everything she could to please him.
sentences.chinese: 她千方百计讨好他。

sentences.english: Most children are eager to please .
sentences.chinese: 大多数孩子都渴望取悦别人。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone happy or satisfied

name: seat
trans: To seat is to place someone in a position where they can sit.

sentences.english: I was in the back seat and Jo was driving.
sentences.chinese: 我在后座，乔开车。

sentences.english: a 10,000-seat stadium
sentences.chinese: 万人体育场

sentences.english: People were shifting in their seats, looking uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 人们在座位上动来动去，看上去不大自在。

sentences.english: He waved toward a chair, and seated himself at the desk.
sentences.chinese: 他朝一把椅子一挥手，在桌旁坐了下来。

detailed_translations.english: a place where you can sit, especially one in a vehicle or one from which you watch a performance, sports event etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…坐下；可容纳…的；使就职
detailed_translations.english: If you seat yourself somewhere, you sit down

name: stable
trans: To stable is to keep something or someone firmly in place and steady.

sentences.english: A wide base will make the structure much more stable.
sentences.chinese: 宽大的底座会使结构牢固许多。

sentences.english: Children like a stable environment.
sentences.chinese: 儿童喜欢稳定的环境。

detailed_translations.chinese: 稳定的，不变的；沉稳的，持重的
detailed_translations.english: steady and not likely to move or change
a building where horses are kept

name: storm
trans: To storm is to move or rush forward forcefully, often with anger or violence.

sentences.english: The governor found himself at the center of a political storm .
sentences.chinese: 州长发现自己处于一场政治风暴的中心。

sentences.english: An angry crowd stormed the embassy.
sentences.chinese: 愤怒的人群突然袭击大使馆。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people suddenly express very strong feelings about something that someone has said or done
to suddenly attack and enter a place using a lot of force

name: team
trans: To team is to work together with others in a coordinated and collaborative way.

sentences.english: black trousers teamed with a bright shirt
sentences.chinese: 配亮色衬衫的黑裤子

sentences.english: You can team up with one other class member if you want.
sentences.chinese: 例句：如果你愿意的话，可以找一个同学组成一组。

detailed_translations.english: to put two things or people together, because they will look good or work well together

name: amazing
trans: To amaze is to surprise or impress someone greatly.

sentences.english: He’s an amazing player to watch.
sentences.chinese: 看他比赛那才叫精彩呢。

sentences.english: an amazing bargain
sentences.chinese: 令人惊喜的便宜货

detailed_translations.english: very good, especially in an unexpected way

name: bat
trans: To bat is to hit something repeatedly with a bat or a similar object.

sentences.english: A bat echolocates the direction.
sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠凭回声测定方向。

sentences.english: Having been suggested by a bat, people invented sonar.
sentences.chinese: 受到蝙蝠的启发，人们发明了声呐。

sentences.english: It is technically incorrect to talk about bat ‘radar’, since they do not use radio waves.
sentences.chinese: 严密来说，说蝙蝠有“雷达”系统是错误的，因为他们并不使用无线电波。

detailed_translations.english: a small animal like a mouse with wings that flies around at night

name: beach
trans: To beach is to bring a boat or a ship to shore and leave it there.

sentences.english: a sandy beach
sentences.chinese: 沙滩

sentences.english: surfers on the beach
sentences.chinese: 沙滩上的冲浪者

detailed_translations.english: an area of sand or small stones at the edge of the sea or a lake

name: blank
trans: To blank is to become empty or devoid of content or meaning.

sentences.english: Leave the last page blank.
sentences.chinese: 最后一页留空。

sentences.english: a blank cassette
sentences.chinese: 一盒空白磁带

sentences.english: When you’ve filled in the blanks , hand the form back to me.
sentences.chinese: 你填好表格以后把它交还给我。

detailed_translations.english: without any writing, print, or recorded sound
an empty space on a piece of paper, where you are supposed to write a word or letter

name: busy
trans: To busy is to occupy oneself with a task or a series of tasks.

sentences.english: She’s busy now – can you phone later?
sentences.chinese: 她现在正忙，你稍后打来好吗？

sentences.english: a busy mother of four
sentences.chinese: 一个忙忙碌碌、育有四个孩子的妈妈

sentences.english: There were lots of activities to keep the kids busy .
sentences.chinese: 有很多活动可以让孩子们不闲着。

sentences.english: December is the busiest time of year for shops.
sentences.chinese: 十二月份是一年中商店最繁忙的时期。

detailed_translations.english: if you are busy, you are working hard and have a lot of things to do

name: catch
trans: To catch is to grab something that is moving or falling through the air.

sentences.english: Did you catch any fish?
sentences.chinese: 你捕到鱼了吗？

sentences.english: Early settlers caught rabbits and squirrels and even rats in order to survive.
sentences.chinese: 早期移民为了生存而捕食野兔、松鼠，甚至老鼠。

sentences.english: I caught the 7.15 train to London.
sentences.chinese: 我赶上了7点15分的火车去伦敦。

sentences.english: Sorry, I didn't quite catch what you said.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我没听清楚你的话。

detailed_translations.english: to trap an animal or fish by using a trap, net, or hook, or by hunting it

name: chain
trans: To chain is to connect two or more things together with a chain.

sentences.english: ...a large supermarket chain.
sentences.chinese: …一家大型连锁超市。

detailed_translations.english: a number of shops, hotels, cinemas etc owned or managed by the same company or person

name: cream
trans: To cream is to mix a substance until it becomes creamy or frothy.

sentences.english: fresh cream
sentences.chinese: 鲜奶油

sentences.english: strawberries and cream
sentences.chinese: 浇奶油的草莓

sentences.english: cream silk stockings
sentences.chinese: 乳白色的长筒丝袜

detailed_translations.english: a thick yellow-white liquid that rises to the top of milk

name: crew
trans: To crew is to work as a member of a team or a crew, especially on a boat or a ship.

sentences.english: The plane crashed, killing two of the crew and four passengers.
sentences.chinese: 飞机坠毁，造成两名机组人员和四名乘客死亡。

sentences.english: a crew member
sentences.chinese: 一名机组人员

detailed_translations.english: all the people who work on a ship or plane

name: detail
trans: To detail is to describe or explain something in great detail.

sentences.english: This issue will be discussed in more detail in Chapter 5.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题将在第五章里作更为详细的论述。

detailed_translations.english: a single feature, fact, or piece of information about something
to list things or give all the facts or information about something

name: detailed
trans: To detail is to pay close attention to the specific and intricate aspects of something.

sentences.english: a beautifully detailed carving
sentences.chinese: 漂亮精致的雕刻

detailed_translations.english: containing or including a lot of information or details

name: interview
trans: To interview is to ask someone a series of questions in order to gather information or to evaluate their suitability for a job or a position.

sentences.english: a portfolio of work presented at interview
sentences.chinese: 在面试时呈递的工作成果样本

sentences.english: a police interview
sentences.chinese: 警方问讯

sentences.english: We’re interviewing six candidates for the job.
